Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Northbound Reroute near Broadway/Hollywood
ShortDescription: Northbound #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Bryn Mawr, Sheridan, Hollywood and Broadway due to street blockage near Broadway/Hollywood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Bryn Mawr, Sheridan, Hollywood, then resume their normal route on Broadway.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near Broadway/Hollywood.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express and Northbound #26 South Shore Express Temporary Reroute at 67th/Paxton
ShortDescription: #6 Jackson Park Exp & NB #26 South Shore Exp buses are rrtd via South Shore, Marquette, Jeffrey, 67th & over normal route due to police activity nr 67th/Paxton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#6 Jackson Park Express and Northbound #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore, Marquette, Jeffrey, 67th, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to police activity near 67th/Paxton.

Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Paxton
ShortDescription: #67 67th/69th/71st buses are rerouted via 67th, Jeffrey, Marquette, Lake Shore, South Shore, 67th and into the terminal due to police activity near 67th/Paxton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Jeffrey, Marquette, Lake Shore, South Shore, 67th and into the terminal.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to police activity near 67th/Paxton.
